dict.acceptation: 建筑物；楼房；房屋；建筑（艺术或行业）；

sent.orig: Metal building- -- Commercial building and metal building workshop.
sent.trans: 金属结构建筑---商业建筑、钢结构厂房。

sent.orig: This area has a lot of masonry building, brick building, adobe building.
sent.trans: 这个区域有大量砖瓦工程，土砖工程。

sent.orig: We contracted with a building firm for building a house at 30,000 yuan.
sent.trans: 我们与一家建筑公司订立了建一座3万元房屋的合同。

sent.orig: Community building around the theme of community building to develop in depth.
sent.trans: 社区党建围绕社区建设主题向纵深发展。

sent.orig: Elevation of building is adhered by light epidermis, light epidermis reveal virile and body-building architecture style.
sent.trans: 建筑立面由轻表皮附着而成，轻表皮所流露出来的建筑气质阳刚而健美。
